subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Shelley Duncan, who faces a three-game suspension for his rough slide into Akinori Iwamura on Wednesday, went 0 for 2 and saw no pitches near his body.
snippet: Shelley Duncan, who faces a three-game suspension for his rough slide into Akinori Iwamura on Wednesday, went 0 for 2 and saw no pitches near his body.
